question: Will I have to pray normal prayers (Salaat) while in Dubai even if I intend to visit Ras-Al-Khaimah within 7 days?
answer:
QUESTION
Respected Mufti Sahab, As-Salaamu Alaykum Wa Rahmatullahui Wa Barakatuhu Jazak Allah for providing me an answer for my question No. 2820. While referring an answer I still want one clarification for my satisfaction. That is, If yes, will I have to repeat my Salaat which I have prayed as Kasr? Jazak Allah. May Allah (the Almighty) increase your knowledge and help you to answer every question according to Sunnah. And may He bestow His mercy on us to live on the path of Islam and die with strong Imaan, Amin. Was Salaam.
ANSWER


Share:
Respected Brother-in-Islam

Assalaamu Alaykum Wa Rahmatullaahi Wa Barakaatuhu

You must perform complete Salaat in Dubai and repeat those Salaats in which
you made Qasr in Dubai.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
